descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Congratulations, you've been promoted! Your room is the new galactic space highway...**

Draw paths for ships to follow 🚀, avoid crashes 💥, destroy enemies 👾, and navigate cosmic obstacles 🎯 to get high scores & unlock power-ups across 4 challenging game modes + 3 difficulties in this mixed-reality arcade game.
[media]
# Features
- **Hand Tracking**: Pinch ships, draw paths, grab asteroids & pull apart cosmablobs with your hands!
- **Room Sense**: Your walls, floor, ceiling, and furniture are part of the game. Route ships coming from your walls, smash asteroids on your couch, or put portals all over your room in Wall Mode.

# 3 Difficulties
- 🟩**Zen**: Take it easy! 10 lives, no asteroids, blobs, blackholes or hyperdrops to worry about.
- 🟦**Normal**: Just your regular day working the Galactic Highway.
- 🟥**Xtreme**: It's going to be a rough day at work.
[media]
# 4 Game Modes
- **Classic Mode**: Route the ships coming from your walls to their portals on the Spaceport in the middle of your room!
- **Wall Mode**: Budget cuts have hit the Department of Intergalactic Transportation, which means you'll have to make do with just your walls, furniture, floor, and ceiling!
- **One Portal Mode**: Because of a clerical error, your station has been replaced with just one portal. You'll be fine, you just have to be a little extra careful when routing ships!
- **Blackhole Mode**: Due to catastrophic technical difficulties, a blackhole has consumed your station. There's still traffic to route, though, so best get on with it and mind the gravity.
[media]
